title: Incredible Machines - Even more contraptions
description:
Game: The Incredible Machine: Even More Contraptions
Platform: PC

Product version number: 1.0.0.0	
Date: 4-10-2001
Sierra On-Line, Inc.

The Incredible Machine: Even More Contraptions gives you exactly what its name implies--more puzzles.
The game is essentially identical to last year&#039;s Return of the Incredible Machine: Contraptions, 
but it includes more than 250 new puzzles divided into several different difficulty levels.
Like its predecessor, Even More Contraptions is an excellent puzzle game that features humorous Rube Goldberg-style machines,
and it is sure to please amateur inventors and puzzle game fans alike. 

Gamespot score: 7.6

(Description taken from www.gamespot.com)



INSTALL:

Just unzip or unrar and PLAY! (might need to run setup.bat)

Uploaded by Algopyrin [old and small PC games].

Have a good time!

KEEP SEEDING IF YOU CAN!
